channel.title: Resume on Portfolio v2
channel.description: Recent content in Resume on Portfolio v2

item.title: Future Reality Lab: Research intern
item.description: Interned at Future Reality Lab under Dr. Perlin, working on simulated life, including boids, state machine agents, and crowd simulations.

item.title: NYU Shanghai: Research assistant
item.description: Worked with Dr. Foong Soon Cheong to explore various web technologies such as Google Puppeteer, Chrome Extensions, Selenium, React, Electron, and d3.

item.title: NYU Shanghai Student Life: Student developer
item.description: Worked on a team of 3 on a legacy project, a lobby display that pulls data from the OrgSync API and shows information such as school events and the weather.
